content.data: Creating a Square Raised Panel Door (cope & stick)
To create an Arched Flat Panel Door with cope & stick construction you must first have an "Inside Edge Profile" that matches your door cutters.

Select a Category to store the Door on, use the "Raised Panel" category. 
 
 Click on the New option in the ribbon. 
 
 Name and give a Description for the Door. 
 
 
 Select Multi Piece for the Type. 
 
 
 Click Next. 
 
 
 Select Raised for the Panel Type. 
 
 
 Click Finish.
Select a Category to store the Door on, use the "Raised Panel" category.
Select a Category to store the Door on, use the "Raised Panel" category.
Click on the New option in the ribbon.
Name and give a Description for the Door.
Name and give a Description for the Door.
Select Multi Piece for the Type.
Select Multi Piece for the Type.
Select Raised for the Panel Type.
Select Raised for the Panel Type.
